column5: This flyer is huge.Lots of rods and reels and the rest of the spring classic stuff,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,BUT,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  Not one float reel is in the sale..Spinning reels,baitcasters.Funny thing to me.Spring would mean,trout,one would think they would have atleast one wouldnt ya
hence the name .....BassProShop    you're looking for StreamProShop      LOL
I have signed up 3 times for the flyer to be sent to my house and not once have I got it I get the catolog but no flyers
Where do I sign up for the flyers?? I would like to get them... Sorry brian for the high jacking
Me too, I hope when they set the price they understood that the loonie is higher than that poor old greenback!!!
Got mine today, put it right beside the throne, good reading material after supper!
The spring fishing classic flyer should be posted very soon....  Bass Pro Flyers
you can also save this in your favorites.  http://toronto.flyerland.ca/
They have papers and pencils just inside the door to sign up for the flyer.
Sale looks ok.  With a reel trade in a new curado will run you as little as $149.97.  Not bad.
Brian, you want a used float reel anyhow.   Best bang for the buck out there.
I was hoping live target lures were going be on sale but alas it seems that is not to be.

I thought they were....or maybe that was the past flyer??   I know I saw the frogs on sale in the flyer that goes to March 10th [or perhaps it's an intro price?] and they have an end display of these lures.  Anyway, are you referring to a new flyer or the one that goes to March 10th?????  Oh, one thing I was wondering is that since the US sale is before the Canadian one people knew in advance about the really good door crashers that weren't even published.  I was at the store the day they had the HDS5s for a crazy price and was wondering how all those people even knew about it.  Well, I guess they all had US friends?? =)  Anyway, anyone have any inside information they'd like to share?!?!?!

I am talking abou tthe new flyer that came today.  Sale starts on the 11th.  Last year they had a gps finder unit as a door crasher for like $250 or something like that but hey did not have the numbers or something was messed up so they gave away HDS5s for that price!!!
Ya ok. You stopping by for that exchange.
